extendedInfo.description: *** Downloaded in over 135 countries! ***Play music from CloudAround, the most popular multi-cloud music player on Android! Experience a beautiful interface that is completely intuitive to use! It is incredibly easy to set up:â Instantly play all of your local music orâ Add your cloud details and simply push the sync buttonBest cloud music app on Androidâ â â â â "This is by far the best cloud music app. It streams seamlessly and alloys me to take my music everywhere. Better than Google Music and Amazon Cloud Player. A++ app with amazing support" - FranciosVery Goodâ â â â â "Does exactly what it claims to do, and does it very well!" - JonathanGreat APPâ â â â â "This is a great alternative for those who do not have access to Google Music. I live in Japan and GMusic is not available here. I am using it on a HTC Desire and It is syncing with my Dropbox" - DanielNo signup needed and no cost! Choose from Amazon S3, Rackspace Cloud Files, Google Drive (premium version only), Dropbox, Box, SugarSync, Microsoft SkyDrive, local songs or all of the above. Download CloudAround and start streaming your music library instantly.  With the CloudAround music player you will have an interface that combines all types of music in one place.  This is better than iCloud and iTunes for Android because you are in control of your music and where it is stored. If you are already backing up and sharing your media with other accounts, then you simply add your login details via CloudAround and within minutes you have access to everything.Featuresâ No account setup requiredâ Integrated local storage media with your music from the cloudâ Caching for instant playbackâ Last.FM Scrobblingâ Download from the cloud straight to your phoneâ Full album art/cover supportâ Automatic song recognition. No searching through filenames!â Hide songs, albums, or artists you dont likeâ Rename songs, albums, or artists that were tagged improperlyâ Gapless playbackâ Streams mp3's or m4a'sâ Pick the folder you want to sync or sync your entire accountâ Seamless integration of multiple clouds in one interfaceâ Full SSL support to protect your secure data transferâ Purchase CloudAround for $1.99 to remove the ads and add more than one accountFor commonly asked questions, check out http://www.cloudaround.com/faq/. If that doesn't help, you can reach out to us for support, errors, features, or to say hello by sending us an email at feedback@cloudaround.com and we will get back to you soon. If you think we can do better, please tell us before leaving feedback. We love feedback and want to put our users at the forefront of innovation.  We want to be your interactive music player of choice.Although very similar to Amazon Cloud Player, Google Music, Cloudskipper, PowerAMP, and Dropbox, CloudAround combines the best of these worlds and lets you access the same data how you want to access it. There is no need to upload all of your music to another provider just so you can stream it.  Let CloudAround find, sort, and tag all of your music for you, instantly! keyterms: Cloud Around, cloud music, dropbox, amazon, drop box, box.net, google music, music player, Music Player, music cloud streaming, itunes, icloud, google drive, googledrive

reviews.title: OGG Vorbis, please!
reviews.comment: I have a mix of MP3s (purchased digital files) and Ogg Vorbis (purchased and ripped CDs). This is the most aesthetically pleasing Dropbox music player, and I\'ll go pro when Ogg is added. :)
reviews.author: Jesse Adelman

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Crashes consistently on latest update. Pretty much unusable
reviews.author: chris cuellar

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works great with my Box account. :)
reviews.author: Tafari Johnson

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my zte with 3g only. Adjustable settings and nice ui. Love this artist art on background

reviews.comment: I really love this app its awesome

reviews.title: Great work but still scope for improvements
reviews.comment: Thanks to the dev team for getting this out. Still I suppose there is scope for improvements. I would love  FLAC support and some equalizer options.
reviews.author: satvik chauhan

reviews.title: I Love It!
reviews.comment: After a truly miserable search for something that could play my clouded music, this delivered precisely what I needed it too. Easy to use, slick interface, it is absolutely the right app for those wanting to play music from the cloud.
reviews.author: James Nealon

reviews.title: So good...
reviews.comment: I WILL be getting the Full version. I also wrote an amazing promo /advert for it just because it\'s THAT GOOD!! (HTC Desire)

reviews.comment: Brilliant app far superior to Google music

reviews.title: Very Good but...
reviews.comment: I have switched from iPho ne to Android and i have transfered all my iTunes music to Box. Everything was fine except I was not sble to sync the playlists. 5 stars if I find a solution for this aspect.

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Great for streaming media from cloud. Can create playlist, has shuffle and repeat options. Only thing missing is a multi file selector
